column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The food has become more and more assembly-line like through the 8 yrs. my wife and I have been going.  The crowd has changed
column3: suburb crowd.  But my wife and I still love it
column4: we go by ourselves on weeknights and it's a great place to entertain ironically
column5: out of town guests.  New items are constantly being introduced
column6: but it's a LEYE chain so the new items are pretty tamed.  But my old favorites have remained
column7: scallops on top of cous cous
column10: the cured meat plate with tomato bread
column11: tenderloin skewer topped with blue cheese
